entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure templates are built via a pipeline to support CG #29108
  • TJ Test Issue #3 [Ignore] #29104
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder Package Causes Application Crash When Installed in .NET 9 in MAUI App #29100
  • DatePicker Format Not Respected on macOS #29099
  • [iOS 9.0.50] MauiIcon's Include parameter must be named appicon #29098

Closed

  • I8_Headers_and_Footers-VSPR Build (9.0.51) displays the footer "2019" in the middle of the header #29051
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [Enhancement] Hot Reload: make Styles with Class hot reload friendly #620
    .NET 10 Planning
  • .Net 9 MAUI MacCatalyst Desktop Shell App TabBar shows "MORE" when > 5 items #28184
  • TJ Test Issue #28739
    Backlog
  • [testing] Re enable some tests for visual comparison #28358
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [ANDROID] - Passing header to Webview #28590
  • Exceptions thrown when removing or inserting groups in a Grouped CollectionView #28113
  • Missing Info.plist value. A value for the Info.plist key 'CFBundleIconName' is missing in the bundle #28954

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Core API XML Documentation #29107
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 9 SR7
  • Changes in provisioning to fix fails installing Appium on Linux #29105
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [inflight] Change inflight package name #29103
  • [.Net10][Proposal] Circle & Polygon clicked event #29101
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-map

Merged

  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 29037 - [2025/04/21] Candidate #29049
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [net10.0] Update sdk version for arcade #29102
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements #28119
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/04/21] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29037
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] SwipeView Closes when Content Changes - fix #29088
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] Button RTL text and image overlap - fix #29041
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Auto Resize chrome icons on iOS to make it more consistent with other platforms - TabBar #29093
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Add Accessibility Selected for Android and iOS CollectionView #29014
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2
  • [iOS] Auto Resize chrome icons on iOS to make it more consistent with other platforms - hamburger icon #29095
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-flyoutpage, area-controls-flyout
  • [inflight][Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28953
    community ✨
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR7
  • [tests] Enable back some MemoryLeak tests #28484
    platform/android 🤖, area-testing, memory-leak 💦, testing-reenable, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: GestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Implement layout system performance metrics #29074
    area-layout, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView EmptyView Feature #28679
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] - Fixed SearchBar Dimension Handling to Respect WidthRequest and HeightRequest Values #27449
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows]Fix Dot based Date Format property in DatePicker not working on Windows #29058
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit #28994
    area-architecture, .NET 10 Planning
  • Obsolete UseMauiCompatibility for .NET 10 #29021
    t/breaking 💥, area-compatibility, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Windows] Fix for Argument Exception raised when the GetStringSize method of ICanvas called with default font #29048
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for IndicatorView using templated icons not working #28905
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed NavigationStack not updating when OnAppearing is invoked #28666
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Grouping Feature #29002
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - On iOS GestureRecognizers don't work on Span in a Label, which doesn't get IsVisible (=true) update from its parent #29024
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Prevent Picker from Gaining Focus #29068
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Backport CarouselView layout SR6 regressions #29062
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed the crash on iOS when setting HeightRequest on WebView inside a ScrollView with IsVisible set to false #29022
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #28661
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion
